definitions.definition: A barbiturate C 11 H 18 N 2 O 2 S (trademark Pentothal ) used in the form of its sodium salt especially as an intravenous anesthetic ; and as a supposed truth serum .

main_definition: ( pharmacology ) A barbiturate C 11 H 18 N 2 O 2 S (trademark Pentothal ) used in the form of its sodium salt especially as an intravenous anesthetic ; and as a supposed truth serum .
